title: essence reaver too weak
body: anyone else think essence reaver passive is negligible. im thinking even if they doubled the 2%-8% increase in mana per auto it still wont make much of a difference in the late game. I think they need to do something to make the passive stronger cause no one ever uses essence reaver , its too weak.

replies.body: putting its passive and CDR on a third item to add to the recipe could help its build path be smoother for laners. IMO the main problem is the only reason you have to buy this item is the mana passive. No other (core) item makes you wait to acquire its full potential. Just my two cents, unless your Canadian
It's not exactly weak it just not really good on most champions.  If you are not playing Ezreal or Lucian, why would you use it?

I think what keeps people from buying this item is the lifesteal. Pouring all that gold into 10% just doesn't feel as good as a bt or bork (given bork has the same lifesteal, but an active healing and also the extra % health bork dmg heals u as well) It just doesnt feel right for the game. Maybe giving it 15 to 20% cdr as well could be a nice enough change as well for it to be worth getting as opposed to more mana, if it just has an infinite pool of mana, that won't be healthy either.
You're supposed to kill minions/monsters to get your mana back.
There was a suggestion a while back that received a mound of up-votes.  It simply changed it from basic attacks grant mana to all physical damage grants mana.

Hit enemy champs for 3% enemy max mana damage as physical damage on hit. Cement it as a mana sustain, anti mage/anti tank item while being bad against ADCs. Also would be great on on-hit bruisers that need alot of mana, like Udyr, while being gated by its upfront cost with the BF sword..
the passive isn't even noticeable though, it needs to be a lot stronger for me to buy this item over botrk or bt

Yes, i think it's really weak. 

It's too niche of a item to be useful. 

Botrk/IE/BT/PD all could be picked up for various reasons. ER only work on a few champions. 

I'd love it if some unique passive could be put into it's kit.
It's not weak, it's just situational. It's seeing LCS play.
